text: Lawson Bekui (born 12 August 1994) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays as a forward for AC Kajaani. ==Career== On 1 March 2019, Bekui joined Finnish club AC Kajaani on loan from Dhofar Club. On 9 September 2019, he then left the club and was loaned out to Muscat Club instead.EXCLUSIVE: Striker Lawson Bekui loaned to Omani side Muscat Club, ghanasoccernet.com, 9 September 2019 ==Honours== Dhofar Club *Oman League: 2016–17 *Oman Super Cup: 2017 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Accra Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:LigaPro players Category:Ykkönen players Category:Liga I players Category:Ghana Premier League players Category:Extremadura UD B players Category:FC Politehnica Iași (2010) players Category:Dhofar S.C.S.C. players Category:AC Kajaani players Category:Muscat Club players Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Oman Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Expatriate footballers in Oman Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland
title: Lawson Bekui
